mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(sw.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime, DATE_FORMAT(sw.updateTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateTime, sw.optionUser, t.name AS exportSubName, bg.exceptionLocationName AS exceptionLocationName, IF(sw.exceptionState = 0,'正常','异常') AS exportState, CONCAT(sw.exceptionValue,' ',bg.unit) AS exportValue, CONCAT(sw.limitValue,' ',bg.unit) AS exportLimitValue FROM sys_warn AS sw LEFT JOIN big_type bg ON bg.type = sw.exceptionLocation LEFT JOIN type t ON t.bigType = sw.exceptionLocation AND t.subIndex = sw.exceptionDescription ORDER BY createTime DESC
